'''Sanctifying Unction''' is an item used to upgrade [[Artifacts]]. It is purchasable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{item|Realm Currency|24|x=90}}. This requires reaching [[Trust Rank]] 8.

It can also be obtained as rewards from select [[Event]]s such as [[Lunar Realm]], [[Spectral Secrets]], [[The Great Banquet of the Adepti]], etc.
